name: Aerodyne Ventures Sdn Bhd
description: Developer of a DT3 (drone technology, data technology & digital transformation) enterprise solutions provider designed for large-scale data operations, analytics, and process optimization. The company's DT3 solutions resolve complex pain points of major industries worldwide by offering valuable capabilities for applications such as transmission tower inspection, wind turbines (WTG), solar farms, and other critical infrastructures, enabling organizations to rapidly scale, digitally transform, operate optimally, and increase productivity.
one_liner: Developer of a DT3 (drone technology, data technology & digital transformation) enterprise solutions provider designed for large-scale data operations, analytics, and process optimization. The company's DT3 solutions resolve complex pain points of major industries worldwide by offering valuable capabilities for applications such as transmission tower inspection, wind turbines (WTG), solar farms, and other critical infrastructures, enabling organizations to rapidly scale, digitally transform, operate optimally, and increase productivity.

name: Aliena Pte Ltd
description: Manufacturer of low-power propulsion systems designed to enhance the performance of satellites in advanced maneuvers in space. The company's systems include miniaturized propulsion systems and end-to-end remote sensing devices for data acquisition and analytics, enabling small satellite designers to get an ideal propulsion system for small satellite missions.
one_liner: Manufacturer of low-power propulsion systems designed to enhance the performance of satellites in advanced maneuvers in space. The company's systems include miniaturized propulsion systems and end-to-end remote sensing devices for data acquisition and analytics, enabling small satellite designers to get an ideal propulsion system for small satellite missions.

name: American Aerospace Technologies, Inc.
description: Provider of manned and unmanned aerial services focused on the oil and gas industry. The company operates aircraft at high altitudes and has a first-mover use case along with offering advanced payloads, flight systems and flight services for near-real-time (NRT) infrastructure patrol, emergency response and mapping thereby, assisting customers with large-scale airspace development and establishing government policies, procedures and practices.
one_liner: Provider of manned and unmanned aerial services focused on the oil and gas industry. The company operates aircraft at high altitudes and has a first-mover use case along with offering advanced payloads, flight systems and flight services for near-real-time (NRT) infrastructure patrol, emergency response and mapping thereby, assisting customers with large-scale airspace development and establishing government policies, procedures and practices.

name: Atomionics Pte. Ltd.
description: Developer of atomic sensing devices designed to accelerate control loop feedback, navigation, and resource exploration. The company's sensors harness the quantum mechanical properties of atoms and provide the measurement of fundamental parameters with utmost precision, enabling clients and research centers to measure parameters like gravity, acceleration, and rotation with better accuracy.
one_liner: Developer of atomic sensing devices designed to accelerate control loop feedback, navigation, and resource exploration. The company's sensors harness the quantum mechanical properties of atoms and provide the measurement of fundamental parameters with utmost precision, enabling clients and research centers to measure parameters like gravity, acceleration, and rotation with better accuracy.

name: Aarav Unmanned Systems Pvt. Ltd
description: Developer of a unique category of scalable end-to-end drone solutions designed for providing large-scale enterprise solutions for a variety of industries and infrastructure development. The company's drone solutions enables you to map about 150 hectares in a single flight with a secure proprietary 3D web-GIS platform developed to solve industry-specific challenges by processing over various images per instance with visual multi-stage quality checks, parallel processing and making use of optimized toolkits, automated workflows to give you 2D and 3D analysis and multiple types of data visualizations in an interactive dashboard using analytical outputs generated and help to create insightful analytics, enabling clients to make well-informed decisions in mining, urban planning, infrastructure, and agriculture.
one_liner: Developer of a unique category of scalable end-to-end drone solutions designed for providing large-scale enterprise solutions for a variety of industries and infrastructure development. The company's drone solutions enables you to map about 150 hectares in a single flight with a secure proprietary 3D web-GIS platform developed to solve industry-specific challenges by processing over various images per instance with visual multi-stage quality checks, parallel processing and making use of optimized toolkits, automated workflows to give you 2D and 3D analysis and multiple types of data visualizations in an interactive dashboard using analytical outputs generated and help to create insightful analytics, enabling clients to make well-informed decisions in mining, urban planning, infrastructure, and agriculture.

name: Avision, Inc.
description: Developer of an unmanned aerial navigation platform designed to control the communication and navigation of robots and drones. The company's platform is comprised of air traffic control software, drone built-in hardware components, and an integration API that automatically regulates traffic for all UAVs connected to it, enabling aerial industries to manage any number of drones with business applications ranging from entertainment to enterprise logistics.
one_liner: Developer of an unmanned aerial navigation platform designed to control the communication and navigation of robots and drones. The company's platform is comprised of air traffic control software, drone built-in hardware components, and an integration API that automatically regulates traffic for all UAVs connected to it, enabling aerial industries to manage any number of drones with business applications ranging from entertainment to enterprise logistics.

name: BetterView Marketplace, Inc.
description: Developer of a property intelligence and risk management platform designed for property and casualty (P&C) insurers. The company's platform identifies and mitigates risk, improves operational and inspection efficiency, and builds a more transparent customer experience throughout the policy lifecycle, empowering insurers to automate pricing, underwriting and renewal while focusing strategic action on critical properties.
one_liner: Developer of a property intelligence and risk management platform designed for property and casualty (P&C) insurers. The company's platform identifies and mitigates risk, improves operational and inspection efficiency, and builds a more transparent customer experience throughout the policy lifecycle, empowering insurers to automate pricing, underwriting and renewal while focusing strategic action on critical properties.

name: Earthgen Technology Co., Ltd.
description: Developer of drones designed for agriculture in Taiwan. The company focuses on drones technology which can be applied in farming, such as manual sraying of pesticides, enabling farmers to improve efficiency.
one_liner: Developer of drones designed for agriculture in Taiwan. The company focuses on drones technology which can be applied in farming, such as manual sraying of pesticides, enabling farmers to improve efficiency.

name: Firnas Aero Inc.
description: Provider of a Drones-as-a-Service platform intended to offer inspection services using our unmanned aerial systems. The company's platform leverages artificial intelligence and utilizes aviation technology in the form of unmanned aviation vehicles for providing inspection services using their own proprietary aerial systems to overcome the risks and challenges of traditional inspection processes, enabling businesses and governments to get more accurate results and eliminate the risks associated with dangerous inspections.
one_liner: Provider of a Drones-as-a-Service platform intended to offer inspection services using our unmanned aerial systems. The company's platform leverages artificial intelligence and utilizes aviation technology in the form of unmanned aviation vehicles for providing inspection services using their own proprietary aerial systems to overcome the risks and challenges of traditional inspection processes, enabling businesses and governments to get more accurate results and eliminate the risks associated with dangerous inspections.

name: Gilmour Space Holdings Pty Ltd
description: Developer of low-cost hybrid rockets designed to launch small satellites into space. The company's hybrid rockets use 3D printed fuel developed by the company helping them to create specific patterns and control how the fuel burns upon ignition, enabling research organizations and clients to launch their satellites in an affordable, reliable, and dedicated way into low earth orbits.
one_liner: Developer of low-cost hybrid rockets designed to launch small satellites into space. The company's hybrid rockets use 3D printed fuel developed by the company helping them to create specific patterns and control how the fuel burns upon ignition, enabling research organizations and clients to launch their satellites in an affordable, reliable, and dedicated way into low earth orbits.

name: GITAI USA Inc.
description: Operator of a space robotics startup intended to conduct tasks in all realms of space development. The company's remote-controlled robots feature low-latency communication and NAT traversal system as well as provide an alternative to human astronauts for long-time work in low earth orbit space stations, enabling space development organizations to reduce the burden on astronauts, shorten the time it takes to perform work in space and reduce costs.
one_liner: Operator of a space robotics startup intended to conduct tasks in all realms of space development. The company's remote-controlled robots feature low-latency communication and NAT traversal system as well as provide an alternative to human astronauts for long-time work in low earth orbit space stations, enabling space development organizations to reduce the burden on astronauts, shorten the time it takes to perform work in space and reduce costs.

name: MightyFly, Inc.
description: Provider of logistics and supply chain services intended to serve medical, spare parts, mining, defense, remote and oil and gas industries. The company connects remote locations together with long-range and heavy cargo aircraft, as well as express, customized aerial drone delivery services and provides rapid and efficient package transport, enabling clients with expedited deliveries that are cheaper and faster.
one_liner: Provider of logistics and supply chain services intended to serve medical, spare parts, mining, defense, remote and oil and gas industries. The company connects remote locations together with long-range and heavy cargo aircraft, as well as express, customized aerial drone delivery services and provides rapid and efficient package transport, enabling clients with expedited deliveries that are cheaper and faster.

name: Aerobotics Pty Ltd
description: Developer of a drone data analytics platform designed to measure and manage the worksites. The company's platform offers worksites the power to measure and manage themselves, with visual tools that everyone can use from any device with flexibility, enabling construction companies, mines, quarries and landfills to improve worksite management efficiency and collaboration while reducing costs and risks.
one_liner: Developer of a drone data analytics platform designed to measure and manage the worksites. The company's platform offers worksites the power to measure and manage themselves, with visual tools that everyone can use from any device with flexibility, enabling construction companies, mines, quarries and landfills to improve worksite management efficiency and collaboration while reducing costs and risks.

name: General Cryo Corp
description: Developer of natural gas-powered aircraft designed to transform the aviation industry. The company's aircraft facilitates the rapid adoption of natural gas vehicles and sources carbon-negative renewable LNG for its customers at low cost as it does not increase the cost of frequently replacing batteries or a heavier aircraft to carry them, enabling clients to avail a carbon-negative air transport system that is economically competitive.
one_liner: Developer of natural gas-powered aircraft designed to transform the aviation industry.
